sentences.sContent: Operations and parameters variability—You can parameterize operations and parameters at the interface definition level.
sentences.sContent_eng: Operations and parameters variability—You can parameterize operations and parameters at the interface definition level.
sentences.sCn: 操作和参数可变性——您可以在接口定义级别参数化操作和参数。

sentences.sContent: Therefore we need to provide variability in the data layer so we can store the nationality of the customer for one bank but not require it for the other.
sentences.sContent_eng: Therefore we need to provide variability in the data layer so we can store the nationality of the customer for one bank but not require it for the other.
sentences.sCn: 因此，我们需要在数据层中提供可变性，以便能够为一家银行存储客户国籍，但另一家银行却不需要如此。

synos.tran: [生物][数]可变性，变化性；变异性

words.tran: 变量的；可变的；易变的，多变的；变异的，[生物] 畸变的
多变的；各式各样的；杂色的
变化；[生物] 变异，变种
[数] 变量；可变物，可变因素
变异；变化；不一致；分歧；[数] 方差
改变；使多样化（vary的过去式和过去分词形式）
